channel.title: Alamogordo Relief Route on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Alamogordo Relief Route on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-70 West/US-54 South at US-70 West
item.description: US-54 South/US-70 West (Relief Route) at US-70 West exit to Las Cruces.

item.title: US-70 West/US-54 South - Relief Route
item.description: US-70 West/US-54 South - Alamogordo Relief Route.

item.title: US-54 South/US-70 West at US-82 and Relief Route
item.description: US-54 South/US-70 West at US-82 and Alamogordo Relief Route. Turn left for US-82 east to Cloudcroft. Turn right to continue on US-54 South/US-70 West to Las Cruces and El Paso (Alamogordo Relief Route). Continue straight for White Sands Blvd. and downtown Alamogordo. This is the western end of US-82.

item.title: US-54 South/US-70 West Approaching US-82
item.description: US-54 South/US-70 West approaching US-82 and Alamogordo Relief Route junction.
